Posts.Content: Jan 1, 2016 09:10AM - edited Jan 1, 2016 09:11AM by jullis Yes!!! I had Taxol and Herceptin for 12 straight weeks and the caps saved 98% of my hair! I had minimal shedding and no one knew I was being treated unless I told them! From what I understand, my treatment protocol is very successful with cold caps. I used Penguin Cold Caps.
Posts.Title: Did cold cap work for you? Deblc jullis
